page.title: 20SCHOOLS AND SCHOOLING
page.content: S.Hylton Primary was opened in 1977, replacing the original school built in 1877. There are 11 classes of about 30 children.The hall is used for dining, P.E.and assemblies. Pennywell Comprehensive was opened in 1968 and at present has 1250 pupils from 11-18 and 86 staff. At St. Anne's Catholic Primary each day begins with a religious service, mornings are spent learning English and Maths and afternoons cover Art, P.E. Music and Environmental studies. Quarry View Juniors was opened in 1953 and at present has 322 pupils. Lessons are similar to those in the other Primary schools. The data for this survey has been compiled by the children and staff of these 4 schools and typed by Peter Welsh.
